5. Write your own Nearest-neighbor classifierÂ¶

We have begun to write a nearest neighbor classifier, but we have left out the best part. Write the for loop that iterates over every sample in the testing data and assigns a single label from the training targets to each of the test samples. First use Eucliden distance as a measure of distance, then try correlation distance. Test your classifers on pairwise or multi-class datasets.
